quote: And yet the murder rate in our country is the highest it’s been in 47 years, right? Did you know that? Forty-seven years.
quotePlain: And yet the murder rate in our country is the highest it’s been in 47 years, right? Did you know that? Forty-seven years.
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: It was higher in the 1980s and '90s.
checks.shortPlain: It was higher in the 1980s and ‘90s.

checks.quote: 2015 is the most recent year the FBI released its annual report compiled by its Uniform Crime Reporting Program. FBI data for crime in the U.S. in that report shows that the murder rate in 2015 was 4.9 per 100,000 inhabitants -- the highest murder rate in six years. In 2009, the murder rate was at 5.0, while 10 years ago, in 2007, the murder rate was at 5.7.
checks.quotePlain: 2015 is the most recent year the FBI released its annual report compiled by its Uniform Crime Reporting Program. FBI data for crime in the U.S. in that report shows that the murder rate in 2015 was 4.9 per 100,000 inhabitants – the highest murder rate in six years. In 2009, the murder rate was at 5.0, while 10 years ago, in 2007, the murder rate was at 5.7.

checks.quote: According to the most recent FBI data available, an estimated 15,696 murders occurred in the United States in 2015, or 4.9 murders per 100,000 people. And while this was the highest murder rate in six years (compared to a range of 4.4 to 4.8 murders per 100,000 each year since 2009, when the figure was 5 per 100,000), it’s less than half the historical high of 10.2 in 1980.
checks.quotePlain: According to the most recent FBI data available, an estimated 15,696 murders occurred in the United States in 2015, or 4.9 murders per 100,000 people. And while this was the highest murder rate in six years (compared to a range of 4.4 to 4.8 murders per 100,000 each year since 2009, when the figure was 5 per 100,000), it’s less than half the historical high of 10.2 in 1980.

claims.title: highest murder rate in 47 years
claims.negative: the murder rate is not the highest it has been in 47 years
claims.negativePlain: the murder rate is not the highest it has been in 47 years
claims.truth: It was higher in the 1980s and '90s.
claims.truthPlain: It was higher in the 1980s and ‘90s.
